actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 673b of title 10, United States Code, to increase from 50,000 to 100,000 the number of members of the Selected Reserve who may be ordered to active duty other than during a war or national emergency.

summary.text: Increases from 50,000 to 100,000 the number of members of the Selected Reserve who may be ordered to active duty other than during a war or national emergency.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 673b of title 10, United States Code, to increase from 50,000 to 100,000 the number of members of the Selected Reserve who may be ordered to active duty other than during a war or national emergency.
